Game.Name: Ultraman Club 3 - Matamata Shutsugeki!! Ultra Kyoudai (Japan)
Game.plot: Ultraman Club 3: Mata Mata Shiyutsugeki!! Ultra Kyoudai is a Role-Playing game, published by Yutaka,which was released in Japan in 1991.
